attributes.action: Debate 'Advisory' EU Referendum Result as not 'Legally Binding'
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to debate fully the implications of leaving the EU before invoking Article 50 as the Referendum result is 'advisory' and not 'legally binding'

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
